company_capsule.tagline: Autonomous agriculture robotics network scaling from California into Latin America
tech_stack_highlights: AWS EKS + IoT Core edge orchestration

primary_personas.name: Mara Singh
primary_personas.title: VP Cloud & Edge Engineering
primary_personas.focus: Predictable OTA updates, SLA clarity, mixed edge-cloud orchestration

primary_personas.name: Luis Ortega
primary_personas.title: Director of Data Reliability
primary_personas.focus: Sensor-to-Snowflake data quality, burst cost controls

opportunity_angle.headline: Managed edge orchestration + FinOps guardrails for a cross-border robotics fleet
pain_signals: Zero-touch provisioning gaps across remote farm endpoints
Seasonal harvest spikes stressing data pipelines
buying_triggers: Latin America expansion with new field robotics pods
Board mandate to standardize observability & cost governance
Series D diligence requiring cloud maturity proof
opportunity_angle.recommended_play: Package managed edge runtime + observability fabric with compliance-ready runbooks; pair with FinOps cockpit that surfaces seasonal spend deltas in real time.
opportunity_angle.competitive_considerations: Currently talking to a HashiCorp services shop and Deloitte AgTech; prior MSP lacked robotics depth—differentiate with edge automation expertise.

company_capsule.tagline: Personalized biologics manufacturer industrializing digital twins for GMP plants
tech_stack_highlights: Databricks Lakehouse federation with Azure ML

primary_personas.name: Dr. Evelyn Park
primary_personas.title: Chief Digital Manufacturing Officer
primary_personas.focus: GMP validation packs, hybrid plant/cloud orchestration

opportunity_angle.headline: Regulated cloud blueprint + audit-ready ML release train ahead of IPO
pain_signals: Fragmented governance across GMP / GxP zones
Slow ML deployment cycles for personalized therapies
Duplicated compliance evidence from a crowded vendor mix
buying_triggers: CFO push for FinOps predictability pre S-1
opportunity_angle.recommended_play: Deliver a validated Azure landing zone with change-control automation, plus ML release pipelines that generate compliance artifacts by default.
opportunity_angle.competitive_considerations: Accenture Life Sciences is courting them; internal teams piloting AWS as shadow IT. Need to position as neutral orchestrator with deeper regulated manufacturing fluency than Slalom.

company_capsule.tagline: Urban eVTOL network operator syncing flight systems with cloud analytics
tech_stack_highlights: BigQuery + Vertex AI + TimescaleDB for telemetry
Rust flight control + React Native passenger app
Security: Drata, Lacework, Cloudflare Zero Trust

primary_personas.name: Sofia Almeida
primary_personas.title: Head of Reliability Engineering
primary_personas.focus: Chaos engineering playbooks, live incident coaching

opportunity_angle.headline: Reliability pod + compliance telemetry spine for 24/7 eVTOL operations
pain_signals: Need deterministic latency between flight controls and analytics
Safety certifications require tamper-proof telemetry lineage
Multi-tenant stakeholder ecosystem needs isolation guardrails
buying_triggers: MOU with Dubai Smart Mobility Council for continuous ops
Recent incident driving board-requested reliability audit
FAA Part 135 prep demanding documented runbooks
opportunity_angle.recommended_play: Drop in a managed reliability pod with latency SLO dashboards + audit-grade telemetry ledger, bundled with FAA-ready runbook library.
opportunity_angle.competitive_considerations: Google PSO is in conversation but pricey; rival partnered with Thoughtworks; in-house SRE bandwidth is thin—emphasize fractional pod model.
